title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 April 2013 - XWiki
content:
<Denis> has quit  
00:43 <polx> has quit  
03:21 <sdumitriu> has quit  
04:30 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
04:42 <kaysush> has joined #xwiki  
05:07 <kaysush> has quit  
05:30 <kaysush> has joined #xwiki  
05:32 <kaysush> Hi , I want to contribute to Advanced Email Integration project through GSOC 2013 but  i am having a problem in understanding how to make changes to the xWiki source code (in local copy ) and deploy the changed on local xWiki instance  
05:51 <Denis> has quit  
06:15 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:00 <vmassol> arghhhhhhhhhh  
08:00 <vmassol> just noticed that I made a mistake in the version name…. 5.0-rc1 instead of 5.0-rc-1  
08:00 <vmassol> going to redo the full release :(  
08:08 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
08:18 <npm> has quit  
08:26 <npm> has joined #xwiki  
14:00 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:00 <vmassol> ok I think I fixed the IRC bot  
14:01 <vmassol> somehow it was marked inactive  
14:01 <vmassol> AndreasJonsson: hi, long time no talk  
14:15 <Strikegun> has quit  
14:19 <vmassol> sburjan`: ping  
14:34 <vmassol> bouquetf: fyi I'm about to release version 1.0 of the crash integration :)  
14:39 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
15:24 <sburjan`> has quit  
15:49 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
16:17 <kaysush> has joined #xwiki  
16:21 <kaysush> sdumitriu : Hi , for the project Advanced Email Integration i installed Apache James , as you suggested , and used it with Outlook email client and it seems promising to me but the problem i found was to slice out the SMTP part from it . There seems no way to take that part out without rewriting it taking some code from the James part .   Can you give me some points on how can i start doing it ?  
16:25 <vmassol> kaysush: you should also check https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/xwiki-application-mailarchive which looks very similar  
16:35 <kaysush> vamssol : so do we have to refine that mailarchive or we have to start implementing from scratch reusing its code wherever possible ?  
16:41 <vmassol> kaysush: I'd suggest you ask this question on the xwiki devs mailing list  
16:42 <kaysush> vamssol : OK thank you  
16:54 <sdumitriu> vmassol: "Unknown macro: contributors" on xwiki.org homepage  
16:54 <vmassol> yes happens after restarts  
16:54 <vmassol> I don't know why  
16:56 <sdumitriu> vmassol: Where is the contributors macro defined? I can't find it  
16:57 <vmassol> sdumitriu: caty did this  
16:57 <vmassol> it's here: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWikiOrgCode/Heartbeat  
16:57 <vmassol> to fix it once is easy, just need to change the cache id  
16:58 <vmassol> but it's going ot be broken again at the next restart  
16:59 <vmassol> sdumitriu: could you please fix xwiki platform master build? you've boken it by applying thomasD's commit  
16:59 <vmassol> if you don't have the time then could you revert the commit?  
16:59 <vmassol> (and let thomasD fix it)  
17:01 <sdumitriu> OK, I'll revert it  
17:16 <bouquetf> Hi  
17:16 <vmassol> hi bouquetf  
17:16 <bouquetf> vmassol: what do you think we can do to improve crsh integration ?  
17:17 <vmassol> bouquetf: support more authentications  
17:17 <vmassol> like ssh key auth and possibly xwiki user auth  
17:17 <vmassol> then provides some useful commands! :)  
17:17 <vmassol> \*provide  
17:18 <bouquetf> yep :) So I can continue xwiki auth by my side. I don't think crash support ssh keys yet  
17:18 <vmassol> if we want we could also make it triggerable from a wiki page  
17:18 <vmassol> it does :)  
17:18 <vmassol> (for the ssh key)  
17:18 <bouquetf> oh nice :)  
17:19 <bouquetf> I'll work on xwiki auth this week  
17:19 <vmassol> cool bouquetf !  
17:19 <vmassol> :)  
17:19 <vmassol> sdumitriu: interesting invalid links above… they are 401 if you're not logged in but fine otherwise… I wonder what we could do about that...  
17:21 <vmassol> actually  
17:22 <vmassol> the problem is that http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebRss?xpage=plain&outputSyntax=plain returns links that are not correct for someone not logged in  
17:22 <vmassol> but the general problem remains  
17:49 <vmassol> !help  
17:49 <vmassol> !bl  
17:51 <vmassol> hmm I don't understand why the ircbot sends broken links since the config says it's inactive...  
18:50 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
19:00 <kaysush> has quit  
19:29 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
19:37 <vmassol> ok I'll stop and restart the bot to try to remove the link checker  
19:38 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
19:40 <vmassol> works cool  
19:40 <vmassol> (I mean I have put an invalid link on that page and the bot didn't report it ;))  
19:40 <vmassol> !bl  
19:40 <vmassol> hmm not in the list of latest broken links though ;)  
19:40 <vmassol> strange....  
19:43 <sdumitriu> has quit  
19:44 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
20:57 <strikegun> has joined #xwiki  
21:09 <strikegun1> has joined #xwiki  
21:12 <strikegun> has quit  
21:41 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
22:24 <polx> has quit  
22:24 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
22:35 <vmassol> has quit  
23:01 <strikegun1> has left #xwiki  
23:06 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
23:18 <abusenius> has quit  
23:20 <Denis2> is now known as <Denis>
